00048         public static bool DoesDatabaseExist(string Database, string ConnectionString)
00049         {
00050             try
00051             {
00052                 return CheckExists("SELECT * FROM Master.sys.Databases WHERE name=@Name", Database, ConnectionString);
00053             }
00054             catch { throw; }
00055         }
00056

00064         {
00065             try
00066             {
00067                 return CheckExists("SELECT * FROM sys.Tables WHERE name=@Name", Table, ConnectionString);
00068             }
00069             catch { throw; }
00070         }

00122         public static void CreateDatabase(Database Database,string ConnectionString)
00123         {
00124             try
00125             {
00126                 string Command = BuildCommands(Database);
00127                 string[] Splitter = { "\n" };
00128                 string[] Commands = Command.Split(Splitter, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);
00129                 string DatabaseConnectionString = Regex.Replace(ConnectionString, "Initial Catalog=(.*?;)", "");
00130                 using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Commands[0], DatabaseConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00131                 {
00132                     try
00133                     {
00134                         Helper.Open();
00135                         Helper.ExecuteNonQuery();
00136                     }
00137                     catch { throw; }
00138                     finally { Helper.Close(); }
00139                 }
00140                 for (int x = 1; x < Commands.Length; ++x)
00141                 {
00142                     using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Commands[x], ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00143                     {
00144                         try
00145                         {
00146                             Helper.Open();
00147                             Helper.ExecuteNonQuery();
00148                         }
00149                         catch { throw; }
00150                         finally { Helper.Close(); }
00151                     }
00152                 }
00153             }
00154             catch { throw; }
00155         }
00156 
00163         public static void UpdateDatabase(Database DesiredDatabase, Database CurrentDatabase, string ConnectionString)
00164         {
00165             try
00166             {
00167                 if (CurrentDatabase == null)
00168                 {
00169                     CreateDatabase(DesiredDatabase, ConnectionString);
00170                     return;
00171                 }
00172                 string Command = BuildCommands(DesiredDatabase, CurrentDatabase);
00173                 string[] Splitter = { "\n" };
00174                 string[] Commands = Command.Split(Splitter, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);
00175                 for (int x = 0; x < Commands.Length; ++x)
00176                 {
00177                     using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Commands[x], ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00178                     {
00179                         try
00180                         {
00181                             Helper.Open();
00182                             Helper.ExecuteNonQuery();
00183                         }
00184                         catch { throw; }
00185                         finally { Helper.Close(); }
00186                     }
00187                 }
00188             }
00189             catch { throw; }
00190         }
00191 
00197         public static Database GetDatabaseStructure(string ConnectionString)
00198         {
00199             string DatabaseName = Regex.Match(ConnectionString, "Initial Catalog=(.*?;)").Value.Replace("Initial Catalog=", "").Replace(";", "");
00200             Database Temp = new Database(DatabaseName);
00201             GetTables(ConnectionString, Temp);
00202             SetupTables(ConnectionString, Temp);
00203             SetupViews(ConnectionString, Temp);
00204             SetupStoredProcedures(ConnectionString, Temp);
00205             SetupFunctions(ConnectionString, Temp);
00206             return Temp;
00207         }

00219         private static string BuildCommands(Database DesiredDatabase, Database CurrentDatabase)
00220         {
00221             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00222 
00223             foreach (Table Table in DesiredDatabase.Tables)
00224             {
00225                 Table CurrentTable = CurrentDatabase[Table.Name];
00226                 if (CurrentTable == null)
00227                 {
00228                     Builder.Append(GetTableCommand(Table));
00229                 }
00230                 else
00231                 {
00232                     Builder.Append(GetAlterTableCommand(Table, CurrentTable));
00233                 }
00234             }
00235             foreach (Table Table in DesiredDatabase.Tables)
00236             {
00237                 Table CurrentTable = CurrentDatabase[Table.Name];
00238                 if (CurrentTable == null)
00239                 {
00240                     Builder.Append(GetTriggerCommand(Table));
00241                 }
00242                 else
00243                 {
00244                     Builder.Append(GetAlterTriggerCommand(Table, CurrentTable));
00245                 }
00246             }
00247             foreach (Function Function in DesiredDatabase.Functions)
00248             {
00249                 bool Found = false;
00250                 foreach (Function CurrentFunction in CurrentDatabase.Functions)
00251                 {
00252                     if (CurrentFunction.Name == Function.Name)
00253                     {
00254                         Builder.Append(GetAlterFunctionCommand(Function, CurrentFunction));
00255                         Found = true;
00256                         break;
00257                     }
00258                 }
00259                 if (!Found)
00260                 {
00261                     Builder.Append(GetFunctionCommand(Function));
00262                 }
00263             }
00264             foreach (View View in DesiredDatabase.Views)
00265             {
00266                 bool Found = false;
00267                 foreach (View CurrentView in CurrentDatabase.Views)
00268                 {
00269                     if (CurrentView.Name == View.Name)
00270                     {
00271                         Builder.Append(GetAlterViewCommand(View, CurrentView));
00272                         Found = true;
00273                         break;
00274                     }
00275                 }
00276                 if (!Found)
00277                 {
00278                     Builder.Append(GetViewCommand(View));
00279                 }
00280             }
00281             foreach (StoredProcedure StoredProcedure in DesiredDatabase.StoredProcedures)
00282             {
00283                 bool Found = false;
00284                 foreach (StoredProcedure CurrentStoredProcedure in CurrentDatabase.StoredProcedures)
00285                 {
00286                     if (StoredProcedure.Name == CurrentStoredProcedure.Name)
00287                     {
00288                         Builder.Append(GetAlterStoredProcedure(StoredProcedure, CurrentStoredProcedure));
00289                         Found = true;
00290                         break;
00291                     }
00292                 }
00293                 if (!Found)
00294                 {
00295                     Builder.Append(GetStoredProcedure(StoredProcedure));
00296                 }
00297             }
00298             return Builder.ToString();
00299         }
00300 
00307         private static string GetAlterStoredProcedure(StoredProcedure StoredProcedure, StoredProcedure CurrentStoredProcedure)
00308         {
00309             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00310             if (StoredProcedure.Definition != CurrentStoredProcedure.Definition)
00311             {
00312                 Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'DROP PROCEDURE ").Append(StoredProcedure.Name).Append("'\n");
00313                 Builder.Append(GetStoredProcedure(StoredProcedure));
00314             }
00315             return Builder.ToString();
00316         }
00317 
00324         private static string GetAlterViewCommand(View View, View CurrentView)
00325         {
00326             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00327             if (View.Definition != CurrentView.Definition)
00328             {
00329                 Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'DROP VIEW ").Append(View.Name).Append("'\n");
00330                 Builder.Append(GetViewCommand(View));
00331             }
00332             return Builder.ToString();
00333         }
00334 
00341         private static string GetAlterFunctionCommand(Function Function, Function CurrentFunction)
00342         {
00343             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00344             if (Function.Definition != CurrentFunction.Definition)
00345             {
00346                 Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'DROP FUNCTION ").Append(Function.Name).Append("'\n");
00347                 Builder.Append(GetFunctionCommand(Function));
00348             }
00349             return Builder.ToString();
00350         }
00351 
00358         private static string GetAlterTriggerCommand(Table Table, Table CurrentTable)
00359         {
00360             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00361             foreach (Trigger Trigger in Table.Triggers)
00362             {
00363                 foreach (Trigger Trigger2 in CurrentTable.Triggers)
00364                 {
00365                     if (Trigger.Name == Trigger2.Name && Trigger.Definition != Trigger2.Definition)
00366                     {
00367                         Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'DROP TRIGGER ").Append(Trigger.Name).Append("'\n");
00368                         string Definition = Regex.Replace(Trigger.Definition, "-- (.*)", "");
00369                         Builder.Append(Definition.Replace("\n", " ").Replace("\r", " ") + "\n");
00370                         break;
00371                     }
00372                 }
00373             }
00374             return Builder.ToString();
00375         }
00376         
00383         private static string GetAlterTableCommand(Table DesiredTable, Table CurrentTable)
00384         {
00385             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00386             foreach (Column Column in DesiredTable.Columns)
00387             {
00388                 Column CurrentColumn = CurrentTable[Column.Name];
00389                 if (CurrentColumn == null)
00390                 {
00391                     Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'ALTER TABLE ").Append(DesiredTable.Name)
00392                         .Append(" ADD ").Append(Column.Name).Append(" ").Append(Column.DataType.ToString());
00393                     if (Column.DataType == SqlDbType.VarChar || Column.DataType == SqlDbType.NVarChar)
00394                     {
00395                         if (Column.Length == -1 || Column.Length == 5000)
00396                         {
00397                             Builder.Append("(MAX)");
00398                         }
00399                         else
00400                         {
00401                             Builder.Append("(").Append(Column.Length.ToString()).Append(")");
00402                         }
00403                     }
00404                     Builder.Append("'\n");
00405                     foreach (Column ForeignKey in Column.ForeignKey)
00406                     {
00407                         Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'ALTER TABLE ").Append(DesiredTable.Name)
00408                             .Append(" ADD FOREIGN KEY (").Append(Column.Name).Append(") REFERENCES ")
00409                             .Append(ForeignKey.ParentTable.Name).Append("(").Append(ForeignKey.Name).Append(")'\n");
00410                     }
00411                 }
00412                 else if (CurrentColumn.DataType != Column.DataType
00413                     || (CurrentColumn.DataType == Column.DataType
00414                         && CurrentColumn.DataType == SqlDbType.NVarChar
00415                         && CurrentColumn.Length != Column.Length * 2
00416                         && (CurrentColumn.Length != -1 && Column.Length != -1)))
00417                 {
00418                     Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'ALTER TABLE ").Append(DesiredTable.Name)
00419                         .Append(" ALTER COLUMN ").Append(Column.Name).Append(" ").Append(Column.DataType.ToString());
00420                     if (Column.DataType == SqlDbType.VarChar || Column.DataType == SqlDbType.NVarChar)
00421                     {
00422                         if (Column.Length == -1 || Column.Length == 5000)
00423                         {
00424                             Builder.Append("(MAX)");
00425                         }
00426                         else
00427                         {
00428                             Builder.Append("(").Append(Column.Length.ToString()).Append(")");
00429                         }
00430                     }
00431                     Builder.Append("'\n");
00432                 }
00433             }
00434             return Builder.ToString();
00435         }
00436 
00442         private static string BuildCommands(Database Database)
00443         {
00444             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00445             Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE DATABASE ").Append(Database.Name).Append("'\n");
00446             foreach (Table Table in Database.Tables)
00447             {
00448                 Builder.Append(GetTableCommand(Table));
00449             }
00450             foreach (Table Table in Database.Tables)
00451             {
00452                 Builder.Append(GetForeignKeyCommand(Table));
00453             }
00454             foreach (Table Table in Database.Tables)
00455             {
00456                 Builder.Append(GetTriggerCommand(Table));
00457             }
00458             foreach (Function Function in Database.Functions)
00459             {
00460                 Builder.Append(GetFunctionCommand(Function));
00461             }
00462             foreach (View View in Database.Views)
00463             {
00464                 Builder.Append(GetViewCommand(View));
00465             }
00466             foreach (StoredProcedure StoredProcedure in Database.StoredProcedures)
00467             {
00468                 Builder.Append(GetStoredProcedure(StoredProcedure));
00469             }
00470             return Builder.ToString();
00471         }
00472 
00478         private static string GetTriggerCommand(Table Table)
00479         {
00480             StringBuilder Builder=new StringBuilder();
00481             foreach (Trigger Trigger in Table.Triggers)
00482             {
00483                 string Definition = Regex.Replace(Trigger.Definition, "-- (.*)", "");
00484                 Builder.Append(Definition.Replace("\n", " ").Replace("\r", " ") + "\n");
00485             }
00486             return Builder.ToString();
00487         }
00488 
00494         private static string GetForeignKeyCommand(Table Table)
00495         {
00496             StringBuilder Builder=new StringBuilder();
00497             foreach (Column Column in Table.Columns)
00498             {
00499                 if (Column.ForeignKey.Count > 0)
00500                 {
00501                     foreach (Column ForeignKey in Column.ForeignKey)
00502                     {
00503                         Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'ALTER TABLE ");
00504                         Builder.Append(Column.ParentTable.Name).Append(" ADD FOREIGN KEY (");
00505                         Builder.Append(Column.Name).Append(") REFERENCES ").Append(ForeignKey.ParentTable.Name);
00506                         Builder.Append("(").Append(ForeignKey.Name).Append(")'\n");
00507                     }
00508                 }
00509             }
00510             return Builder.ToString();
00511         }
00512 
00518         private static string GetStoredProcedure(StoredProcedure StoredProcedure)
00519         {
00520             string Definition = Regex.Replace(StoredProcedure.Definition, "-- (.*)", "");
00521             return Definition.Replace("\n"," ").Replace("\r"," ")+"\n";
00522         }
00523 
00529         private static string GetViewCommand(View View)
00530         {
00531             string Definition = Regex.Replace(View.Definition, "-- (.*)", "");
00532             return Definition.Replace("\n", " ").Replace("\r", " ") + "\n";
00533         }
00534 
00540         private static string GetFunctionCommand(Function Function)
00541         {
00542             string Definition = Regex.Replace(Function.Definition, "-- (.*)", "");
00543             return Definition.Replace("\n", " ").Replace("\r", " ") + "\n";
00544         }

00551         private static string GetTableCommand(Table Table)
00552         {
00553             StringBuilder Builder=new StringBuilder();
00554             Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE TABLE ").Append(Table.Name).Append("(");
00555             string Splitter="";
00556             foreach (Column Column in Table.Columns)
00557             {
00558                 Builder.Append(Splitter).Append(Column.Name).Append(" ").Append(Column.DataType.ToString());
00559                 if (Column.DataType == SqlDbType.VarChar || Column.DataType == SqlDbType.NVarChar)
00560                 {
00561                     if (Column.Length == -1||Column.Length==5000)
00562                     {
00563                         Builder.Append("(MAX)");
00564                     }
00565                     else
00566                     {
00567                         Builder.Append("(").Append(Column.Length.ToString()).Append(")");
00568                     }
00569                 }
00570                 if (!Column.Nullable)
00571                 {
00572                     Builder.Append(" NOT NULL");
00573                 }
00574                 if (Column.Unique)
00575                 {
00576                     Builder.Append(" UNIQUE");
00577                 }
00578                 if (Column.PrimaryKey)
00579                 {
00580                     Builder.Append(" PRIMARY KEY");
00581                 }
00582                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Column.Default))
00583                 {
00584                     Builder.Append(" DEFAULT ").Append(Column.Default.Replace("(", "").Replace(")", "").Replace("'","''"));
00585                 }
00586                 if (Column.AutoIncrement)
00587                 {
00588                     Builder.Append(" IDENTITY");
00589                 }
00590                 Splitter = ",";
00591             }
00592             Builder.Append(")'\n");
00593             int Counter = 0;
00594             foreach (Column Column in Table.Columns)
00595             {
00596                 if (Column.Index&&Column.Unique)
00597                 {
00598                     Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ");
00599                     Builder.Append("Index_").Append(Column.Name).Append(Counter.ToString()).Append(" ON ");
00600                     Builder.Append(Column.ParentTable.Name).Append("(").Append(Column.Name).Append(")");
00601                     Builder.Append("'\n");
00602                 }
00603                 else if (Column.Index)
00604                 {
00605                     Builder.Append("EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE INDEX ");
00606                     Builder.Append("Index_").Append(Column.Name).Append(Counter.ToString()).Append(" ON ");
00607                     Builder.Append(Column.ParentTable.Name).Append("(").Append(Column.Name).Append(")");
00608                     Builder.Append("'\n");
00609                 }
00610                 ++Counter;
00611             }
00612             return Builder.ToString();
00613         }
00614 
00620         private static void SetupFunctions(string ConnectionString, Database Temp)
00621         {
00622             string Command = "SELECT SPECIFIC_NAME as NAME,ROUTINE_DEFINITION as DEFINITION FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.ROUTINES WHERE INFORMATION_SCHEMA.ROUTINES.ROUTINE_TYPE='FUNCTION'";
00623             using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Command, ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00624             {
00625                 try
00626                 {
00627                     Helper.Open();
00628                     Helper.ExecuteReader();
00629                     while (Helper.Read())
00630                     {
00631                         string Name = (string)Helper.GetParameter("NAME", "");
00632                         string Definition = (string)Helper.GetParameter("DEFINITION", "");
00633                         Temp.AddFunction(Name, Definition);
00634                     }
00635                 }
00636                 catch { }
00637                 finally { Helper.Close(); }
00638             }
00639         }
00640 
00646         private static void SetupStoredProcedures(string ConnectionString, Database Temp)
00647         {
00648             string Command = "SELECT sys.procedures.name as NAME,OBJECT_DEFINITION(sys.procedures.object_id) as DEFINITION FROM sys.procedures";
00649             using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Command, ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00650             {
00651                 try
00652                 {
00653                     Helper.Open();
00654                     Helper.ExecuteReader();
00655                     while (Helper.Read())
00656                     {
00657                         string ProcedureName = (string)Helper.GetParameter("NAME", "");
00658                         string Definition = (string)Helper.GetParameter("DEFINITION", "");
00659                         Temp.AddStoredProcedure(ProcedureName, Definition);
00660                     }
00661                 }
00662                 catch { }
00663                 finally { Helper.Close(); }
00664             }
00665             foreach (StoredProcedure Procedure in Temp.StoredProcedures)
00666             {
00667                 Command = "SELECT sys.systypes.name as TYPE,sys.parameters.name as NAME,sys.parameters.max_length as LENGTH,sys.parameters.default_value as [DEFAULT VALUE] FROM sys.procedures INNER JOIN sys.parameters on sys.procedures.object_id=sys.parameters.object_id INNER JOIN sys.systypes on sys.systypes.xusertype=sys.parameters.system_type_id WHERE sys.procedures.name=@ProcedureName AND (sys.systypes.xusertype <> 256)";
00668                 using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Command, ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00669                 {
00670                     try
00671                     {
00672                         Helper.Open();
00673                         Helper.AddParameter("@ProcedureName", Procedure.Name, 128);
00674                         Helper.ExecuteReader();
00675                         while (Helper.Read())
00676                         {
00677                             string Type = (string)Helper.GetParameter("TYPE", "");
00678                             string Name = (string)Helper.GetParameter("NAME", "");
00679                             int Length = int.Parse(Helper.GetParameter("LENGTH", 0).ToString());
00680                             string Default = (string)Helper.GetParameter("DEFAULT VALUE", "");
00681                             Procedure.AddColumn(Name, Type, Length, Default);
00682                         }
00683                     }
00684                     catch { }
00685                     finally { Helper.Close(); }
00686                 }
00687             }
00688         }
00689 
00695         private static void SetupViews(string ConnectionString, Database Temp)
00696         {
00697             foreach (View View in Temp.Views)
00698             {
00699                 string Command = "SELECT OBJECT_DEFINITION(sys.views.object_id) as Definition FROM sys.views WHERE sys.views.name=@ViewName";
00700                 using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Command, ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00701                 {
00702                     try
00703                     {
00704                         Helper.Open();
00705                         Helper.AddParameter("@ViewName", View.Name, 128);
00706                         Helper.ExecuteReader();
00707                         if (Helper.Read())
00708                         {
00709                             View.Definition = (string)Helper.GetParameter("Definition", "");
00710                         }
00711                     }
00712                     catch { }
00713                     finally { Helper.Close(); }
00714                 }
00715                 Command = "SELECT sys.columns.name AS [Column], sys.systypes.name AS [COLUMN TYPE], sys.columns.max_length as [MAX LENGTH], sys.columns.is_nullable as [IS NULLABLE] FROM sys.views INNER JOIN sys.columns on sys.columns.object_id=sys.views.object_id INNER JOIN sys.systypes ON sys.systypes.xtype = sys.columns.system_type_id WHERE (sys.views.name = @ViewName) AND (sys.systypes.xusertype <> 256)";
00716                 using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Command, ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00717                 {
00718                     try
00719                     {
00720                         Helper.Open();
00721                         Helper.AddParameter("@ViewName", View.Name, 128);
00722                         Helper.ExecuteReader();
00723                         while (Helper.Read())
00724                         {
00725                             string ColumnName = (string)Helper.GetParameter("Column", "");
00726                             string ColumnType = (string)Helper.GetParameter("COLUMN TYPE", "");
00727                             int MaxLength = (int)(int.Parse(Helper.GetParameter("MAX LENGTH", 0).ToString()));
00728                             bool Nullable = (bool)Helper.GetParameter("IS NULLABLE", false);
00729                             View.AddColumn(ColumnName, ColumnType, MaxLength, Nullable);
00730                         }
00731                     }
00732                     catch { }
00733                     finally { Helper.Close(); }
00734                 }
00735             }
00736         }
00737 
00743         private static void SetupTables(string ConnectionString, Database Temp)
00744         {
00745             foreach (Table Table in Temp.Tables)
00746             {
00747                 string Command = "SELECT sys.columns.name AS [Column], sys.systypes.name AS [COLUMN TYPE], sys.columns.max_length as [MAX LENGTH], sys.columns.is_nullable as [IS NULLABLE], sys.columns.is_identity as [IS IDENTITY], sys.index_columns.index_id as [IS INDEX], key_constraints.name as [PRIMARY KEY], key_constraints_1.name as [UNIQUE], tables_1.name as [FOREIGN KEY TABLE], columns_1.name as [FOREIGN KEY COLUMN], sys.default_constraints.definition as [DEFAULT VALUE] FROM sys.tables INNER JOIN sys.columns on sys.columns.object_id=sys.tables.object_id INNER JOIN sys.systypes ON sys.systypes.xtype = sys.columns.system_type_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.index_columns on sys.index_columns.object_id=sys.tables.object_id and sys.index_columns.column_id=sys.columns.column_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.key_constraints on sys.key_constraints.parent_object_id=sys.tables.object_id and sys.key_constraints.parent_object_id=sys.index_columns.object_id and sys.index_columns.index_id=sys.key_constraints.unique_index_id and sys.key_constraints.type='PK' LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.foreign_key_columns on sys.foreign_key_columns.parent_object_id=sys.tables.object_id and sys.foreign_key_columns.parent_column_id=sys.columns.column_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.tables as tables_1 on tables_1.object_id=sys.foreign_key_columns.referenced_object_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.columns as columns_1 on columns_1.column_id=sys.foreign_key_columns.referenced_column_id and columns_1.object_id=tables_1.object_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.key_constraints as key_constraints_1 on key_constraints_1.parent_object_id=sys.tables.object_id and key_constraints_1.parent_object_id=sys.index_columns.object_id and sys.index_columns.index_id=key_constraints_1.unique_index_id and key_constraints_1.type='UQ' LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.default_constraints on sys.default_constraints.object_id=sys.columns.default_object_id WHERE (sys.tables.name = @TableName) AND (sys.systypes.xusertype <> 256)";
00748                 using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Command, ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00749                 {
00750                     try
00751                     {
00752                         Helper.Open();
00753                         Helper.AddParameter("@TableName", Table.Name, 128);
00754                         Helper.ExecuteReader();
00755                         while (Helper.Read())
00756                         {
00757                             string ColumnName = (string)Helper.GetParameter("Column", "");
00758                             string ColumnType = (string)Helper.GetParameter("COLUMN TYPE", "");
00759                             int MaxLength = (int)(int.Parse(Helper.GetParameter("MAX LENGTH", 0).ToString()));
00760                             bool Nullable = (bool)Helper.GetParameter("IS NULLABLE", false);
00761                             bool Identity = (bool)Helper.GetParameter("IS IDENTITY", false);
00762                             bool Index = (bool)((int)Helper.GetParameter("IS INDEX", 0) != 0);
00763                             bool PrimaryKey = string.IsNullOrEmpty((string)Helper.GetParameter("PRIMARY KEY", "")) ? false : true;
00764                             bool Unique = string.IsNullOrEmpty((string)Helper.GetParameter("UNIQUE", "")) ? false : true;
00765                             string ForeignKeyTable = (string)Helper.GetParameter("FOREIGN KEY TABLE", "");
00766                             string ForeignKeyColumn = (string)Helper.GetParameter("FOREIGN KEY COLUMN", "");
00767                             string DefaultValue = (string)Helper.GetParameter("DEFAULT VALUE", "");
00768                             if (Table.ContainsColumn(ColumnName))
00769                             {
00770                                 Table.AddForeignKey(ColumnName, ForeignKeyTable, ForeignKeyColumn);
00771                             }
00772                             else
00773                             {
00774                                 Table.AddColumn(ColumnName, ColumnType, MaxLength, Nullable, Identity, Index, PrimaryKey, Unique, ForeignKeyTable, ForeignKeyColumn, DefaultValue);
00775                             }
00776                         }
00777                     }
00778                     catch { }
00779                     finally { Helper.Close(); }
00780                 }
00781                 Command = "SELECT sys.triggers.name as Name,sys.trigger_events.type as Type,OBJECT_DEFINITION(sys.triggers.object_id) as Definition FROM sys.triggers INNER JOIN sys.trigger_events ON sys.triggers.object_id=sys.trigger_events.object_id INNER JOIN sys.tables on sys.triggers.parent_id=sys.tables.object_id where sys.tables.name=@TableName";
00782                 using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Command, ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00783                 {
00784                     try
00785                     {
00786                         Helper.Open();
00787                         Helper.AddParameter("@TableName", Table.Name, 128);
00788                         Helper.ExecuteReader();
00789                         while (Helper.Read())
00790                         {
00791                             string Name = (string)Helper.GetParameter("Name", "");
00792                             int Type = (int)Helper.GetParameter("Type", 0);
00793                             string Definition = (string)Helper.GetParameter("Definition", "");
00794                             Table.AddTrigger(Name, Definition, Type);
00795                         }
00796                     }
00797                     catch { }
00798                     finally { Helper.Close(); }
00799                 }
00800             }
00801             foreach (Table Table in Temp.Tables)
00802             {
00803                 Table.SetupForeignKeys();
00804             }
00805         }
00806 
00812         private static void GetTables(string ConnectionString, Database Temp)
00813         {
00814             string Command = "SELECT TABLE_CATALOG, TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES";
00815             using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Command, ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00816             {
00817                 try
00818                 {
00819                     Helper.Open();
00820                     Helper.ExecuteReader();
00821                     while (Helper.Read())
00822                     {
00823                         string TableName = (string)Helper.GetParameter("TABLE_NAME", "");
00824                         string TableType = (string)Helper.GetParameter("TABLE_TYPE", "");
00825                         if (TableType == "BASE TABLE")
00826                         {
00827                             Temp.AddTable(TableName);
00828                         }
00829                         else if (TableType == "VIEW")
00830                         {
00831                             Temp.AddView(TableName);
00832                         }
00833                     }
00834                 }
00835                 catch { }
00836                 finally { Helper.Close(); }
00837             }
00838         }
00839 
00847         private static bool CheckExists(string Command, string Name, string ConnectionString)
00848         {
00849             bool Exists = false;
00850             using (SQLHelper Helper = new SQLHelper(Command, ConnectionString, CommandType.Text))
00851             {
00852                 try
00853                 {
00854                     Helper.Open();
00855                     Helper.AddParameter("@Name", Name, 200);
00856                     Helper.ExecuteReader();
00857                     if (Helper.Read())
00858                         Exists = true;
00859                 }
00860                 catch { }
00861                 finally { Helper.Close(); }
00862             }
00863             return Exists;
00864         }
